data.chText: 扁桃仁；杏仁（扁桃树的果仁）
data.enText: the flat pale sweet nut of the almond tree used in cooking and to make almond oil
blanched almonds (= with their skins removed)
almond eyes (= eyes shaped like almonds )

tr: oval-shaped edible seed of the almond tree
small bushy deciduous tree native to Asia and North Africa having pretty pink blossoms and highly prized edible nuts enclosed in a hard green hull
cultivated in southern Australia and California

value.def: Almonds are pale oval nuts. They are often used in cooking.
An almond or an almond tree, is a tree on which almonds grow.

example.ex: On the left was a plantation of almond trees.
